thread.title: New DOSM takes up post at JW Marriott Bangkok
thread.title_full: New DOSM takes up post at JW Marriott Bangkok

author: Bangkok, October 13, 2015
title: New DOSM takes up post at JW Marriott Bangkok
text:
New DOSM takes up post at JW Marriott Bangkok Bangkok, October 13, 2015 
HELENE Fong has become the director of sales and marketing at JW Marriott Hotel Bangkok. 

Fong has moved within the group to take up the post, coming from JW Marriott Hong Kong where she was director of marketing since September 2012. Prior to joining JW Marriott, she also held the same position from May 2011 to May 2012 at Shangri-La Hotel Bangkok & Shangri-La Hotel Chiang Mai. 

Between November 2009 to May 2011, Fong was the director of sales and marketing at the China World Summit Wing, Beijing (a Shangri-La Hotel), the Futian Shangri-La, Shenzhen, the Crown Plaza, Shenzhen, the Traders Hotel, Beijing as well as being the director of sales at the Pudong Shangri-La, Shanghai.
